revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=WeVO |model=W622SL |revision= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Netis |manuf_model= |availability=Korea only |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=ENQ32B-104HIP |ram1=16 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |serial= |jtag= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192CE |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=wevo |default_ssid_regex=^wevo$ |default_ip=192.168.10.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} :[http://iwevo.co.kr/product_intro.php?model=351010 Product page] (KR)
The below reviews indicate the device has a 4MB '''Eon''' EN25Q32B-104HIP, :the reviews (and WeVO product page) indicate the device has 2MB Flash.
*[http://blog.daum.net/summerflavor/7244314 Images on blog.daum.net] :"PB-8118-M02G-00" and "2010-07-05" is silkscreened on the board. :This would seem to indicate that '''Netis''' manufactured this device. :"SWFW01528", "W622SL-V2.0.2", "G111229 XDWR00240V02", and :"04111200155-S0-01570" is printed on a label affixed to the RAM chip. :The default SSID appears to be '''wevo'''. WiGLE indicates that this :SSID mainly uses '''Netis / Netcore''' OUIs (08:10:75 and 08:10:76). *[http://review.auction.co.kr/ShoppingGuide/GuideView.aspx?noGuide=496231&category=50130213&itemNo=A604643780 Review on auction.co.kr] :RTL8196C SoC, RTL8192CE Wireless :"SWFW01528", "W622SL-V2.0.2", "G111229 XDWR00240V02" and :"04111200155-S0-00160" is printed on a label affixed to the RAM chip.
